title: Problem-Centered Simulation-Based Language Learning Course to Stimulate Cognitive Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and intermediate-level comprehension of linguistic rules
context.additional_context: A practical language education environment for working professionals. Task performance through VR simulations replicating real workplace scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can analyze language problem situations presented in VR simulations and articulate intellectual needs that cannot be addressed by existing knowledge.
Through collaborative learning with peers, learners can derive and apply at least three language strategies to meet intellectual needs.
Learners can explain language competencies acquired during the resolution of intellectual needs in real-world work contexts through project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
